meanings.definition: The property of a material having two refractive indices.
meanings.sent1: The birefringences of the crystal made it appear like two separate images.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the birefringences of the mineral to understand its optical properties.
meanings.sent3: The birefringences in the glass caused a funny distortion in the light passing through.
meanings.sent4: Her sunglasses created a birefringences effect, making everything look slightly shifted.
meanings.sent5: The birefringences of the diamond were so clear, it seemed like looking through a prism.

meanings.definition: The phenomenon of double refraction in a crystal.
meanings.sent1: The birefringences of the crystal split the light into two distinct paths.
meanings.sent2: Mineralogists often encounter birefringences when examining certain crystals.
meanings.sent3: The birefringences in the crystal made the light dance in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent4: The birefringences of the gemstone created a dazzling display of colors.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the birefringences of the crystal were clearly visible.
